description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Magic Thighs & Slightly Phil escape Eugene’s Lair in this INTENSE TWIN-STICK SHOOTER.  Battle alone, or co-op with a friend; fighting over 42 action-packed levels.  Compare you best scores against the world with an on-line (P2P) hi-score table.  PREPARE FOR MAYHEM - PREPARE FOR DESTRUCTION - PREPARE FOR NORT:TRON 84
